articles.title: Wall Street Is Sending a Bullish Signal for S&P 500 Earnings - Bloomberg
articles.description: Analysts are ratcheting up earnings forecasts for the current quarter at the swiftest pace in two years, suggesting that the worst of Corporate America’s profit slump may be firmly in the rear-view mirror.
